properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 6 at 11:06AM MST until January 7 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Snow is
expected through the afternoon, mixed precipitation is possible
during the evening and overnight.


* WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED
